articles.author: LORNE COOK, RAF CASERT
articles.title: EU leaders scramble to avoid friction with the US under Trump and avoid a ‘stupid tariff war’ - The Associated Press
articles.description: European Union leaders are grappling with how to respond to the United States as it appears determined to start a trade war or even seize part of their territory. The leaders met on Monday for a defense summit. Poland's prime minister, whose country currently…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) After three years spent trying to deter Russia from destroying Ukraine, European Union leaders grappled on Monday with how to respond to a major ally who appears determined to start a t… [+4640 chars]
